survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding plant-based dairy alternatives. The insights will help businesses tailor their product offerings and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?

questions.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question to capture various influencing factors. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based dairy alternatives? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current variety of plant-based dairy alternatives available in the market?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q4
